function.name: github_project
function.description:
Manage GitHub project items and draft issues.
 * State is persistent across command calls
 * Supports list, create, update, search, and get operations
 * Uses PVTI_ IDs for user interactions, internally handles DI_ IDs for updates
 * Maintains efficient caching to reduce API calls
 * All operations require a project number
 
 Notes for using commands:
 * The *`list`* command shows all items with their PVTI_ IDs
 * The *`create`* command requires a title, body is optional
 * The *`update`* command accepts PVTI_ ID from list/search results and internally handles ID conversion
 * The *`search`* command requires a query string to search titles
 * The *`get`* command requires PVTI_ ID from list/search results
 
 ID Format Notes:
 * Use PVTI_ IDs shown in list/search results (e.g. PVTI_abc123) for all commands
 * The tool automatically handles DI_ IDs internally for updates
 * Use list command to find valid PVTI_ IDs for items

command.description: The operation to perform on the GitHub project.

project_number.description: The GitHub project number to operate on.

item_id.description: Required for update and get commands. Provide the PVTI_ ID (e.g. PVTI_abc123) obtained from list/search results. The tool automatically handles DI_ ID conversion for updates internally. Use list command first to find valid PVTI_ IDs.

title.description: Required for create command, optional for update. The title of the item.

body.description: Optional for create and update commands. The body content of the item.

query.description: Required for search command. The search query string to match against item titles.
